title: Embracer Acquires Everything & Dead Island 2 LIVES - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.18.22
description:
Blessing is joined by Cameron Hawkins who reviewed Soul Hackers 2 for IGN! We talk about Soul Hackers 2, Embracer acquiring everything under the sun including Lord of The Rings, and Dead Island 2 leaking all over the place.  

Follow Cam: https://twitter.com/CamFinalMix

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:33 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now with a WILD cast. It’s me, Snowbike Mike, Barrett Courtney, and Janet Garcia and it’s a very special Kinda Feudy episode of the show. We also talk Fortnite DBZ, Rollerdrome, We Are OFK, and more. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFUnnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
PS I Love You XOXO is recording a bit later today and we’re talking about what we want from PlayStation’s next showcase. We want your thoughts! Write into Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and let us know games or announcements you’d want to see at PlayStation’s next showcase and we’ll talk about your write-ins on the show.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:01 - Cam Hawkins is here!
00:07:13 - Embracer acquires everything
00:25:29 - Embracer seemingly confirms Kotor Remake is switching developers
00:27:07 - Dead Island 2 is back from the dead
00:33:08 - Soul Hackers 2 Review Round Up
00:44:54 - Final Fantasy Producer Naoki Yoshida Says The Series Is ‘Struggling’
00:49:03 - Nintendo 'Actively' Investigating Recent Claims Of Misconduct
00:51:19 - Nintendo reportedly plans to boost Switch supply by shrinking its packaging
00:52:03 - We almost got an Iron Man made by the Just Cause devs
00:54:27 - Cult of the Lamb has sold 1 million copies
00:55:32 - Elden Ring has shipped 16.6 million copies as of June
00:57:00 -  Ad
00:59:16 - Out today
01:01:54 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless

content:encoded:
Blessing is joined by Cameron Hawkins who reviewed Soul Hackers 2 for IGN! We talk about Soul Hackers 2, Embracer acquiring everything under the sun including Lord of The Rings, and Dead Island 2 leaking all over the place.


Follow Cam: https://twitter.com/CamFinalMix


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:01:33 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now with a WILD cast. It’s me, Snowbike Mike, Barrett Courtney, and Janet Garcia and it’s a very special Kinda Feudy episode of the show. We also talk Fortnite DBZ, Rollerdrome, We Are OFK, and more. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFUnnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.

PS I Love You XOXO is recording a bit later today and we’re talking about what we want from PlayStation’s next showcase. We want your thoughts! Write into Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and let us know games or announcements you’d want to see at PlayStation’s next showcase and we’ll talk about your write-ins on the show.
